%% LyX 2.0.0 created this file.  For more info, see http://www.lyx.org/.
%% Do not edit unless you really know what you are doing.
\documentclass[english]{article}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}
\usepackage{geometry}
\geometry{verbose,tmargin=1cm,bmargin=1cm,lmargin=1cm,rmargin=1cm}

\makeatletter

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% LyX specific LaTeX commands.
%% Because html converters don't know tabularnewline
\providecommand{\tabularnewline}{\\}

\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}

\subsection*{Conversion Set A: replace and wrap, 0 or more {*}'s}

\textbf{General: }\LaTeX{}\_tag\{\emph{text}\} $\rightarrow$\emph{
}Markdown\_tag\emph{\_lefttext}Markdown\_tag\_right OR \LaTeX{}\_tag{*}\{\emph{text}\}
$\rightarrow$\emph{ }Markdown\_tag\emph{\_lefttext}Markdown\_tag\_right
OR 

\textbf{Example:} \textbackslash{}part\{\emph{text}\} $\rightarrow$
\emph{\$text}\# OR\textbackslash{}part{*}\{\emph{text}\} $\rightarrow$
\$\emph{text}\#

\begin{tabular}{|c|c|c|c|}
\hline 
\LaTeX{}\_tag & Markdown\_tag\_left & Markdown\_tag\_left & Comments\tabularnewline
\hline 
\hline 
part & \#  & \# & $\exists$ a space after Markdown\_tag\_left\tabularnewline
\hline 
section & \#\#  & \#\# & $\exists$ a space after Markdown\_tag\_left\tabularnewline
\hline 
subsection & \#\#\#  & \#\#\# & $\exists$ a space after Markdown\_tag\_left\tabularnewline
\hline 
subsubsection & \#\#\#\#  & \#\#\#\# & $\exists$ a space after Markdown\_tag\_left\tabularnewline
\hline 
paragraph & \#\#\#\#\#  & \#\#\#\#\# & $\exists$ a space after Markdown\_tag\_left\tabularnewline
\hline 
textbf & {*}{*} & {*}{*} & \tabularnewline
\hline 
emph & {*} & {*} & \tabularnewline
\hline 
caption & {*} & {*} & Arbitrary superset decision - captions not supported in Markdown\tabularnewline
\hline 
mathmd &  &  & remove it\tabularnewline
\hline 
 &  &  & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\end{tabular}


\subsection*{Conversion Set B: begin/end insertion}

\textbf{General: }\textbackslash{}begin\{\LaTeX{}\_tag\} \emph{text
}\textbackslash{}end\{\LaTeX{}\_tag\} $\rightarrow$ Markdown\_tag\textbackslash{}begin\{\LaTeX{}\_tag\}
\emph{text }\textbackslash{}end\{\LaTeX{}\_tag\}Markdown\_tag

\textbf{Example:} \textbackslash{}begin\{eqnarray\} \emph{text }\textbackslash{}end\{eqnarray\}
$\rightarrow$ \$\$\textbackslash{}begin\{eqnarray\} \emph{text }\textbackslash{}end\{eqnarray\}\$\$

\begin{tabular}{|c|c|c|}
\hline 
\LaTeX{}\_tag & Markdown\_tag & Comments\tabularnewline
\hline 
\hline 
eqnarray & \$\$ & MathJax syntax\tabularnewline
\hline 
\end{tabular}


\subsection*{Conversion Set C: find and replace}

\textbf{General: }\LaTeX{}\_tag $\rightarrow$ Markdown\_tag

\textbf{Example: }\textbackslash{}item $\rightarrow$ {*}

\begin{tabular}{|c|c|c|}
\hline 
\LaTeX{}\_tag & Markdown\_tag & Comments\tabularnewline
\hline 
\hline 
\textbackslash{}item & {*} & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\textbackslash{}begin\{itemize\} &  & i.e. remove the \LaTeX{}\_tag\tabularnewline
\hline 
\textbackslash{}end\{itemize\} &  & i.e. remove the \LaTeX{}\_tag\tabularnewline
\hline 
\textbackslash{}begin\{tabular\} &  & i.e. remove the \LaTeX{}\_tag\tabularnewline
\hline 
\textbackslash{}end\{tabular\} &  & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\textbackslash{}begin\{minipage\} & \textbackslash{}n{*}{*}{*}\textbackslash{}n & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\textbackslash{}end\{minipage\} & \textbackslash{}n{*}{*}{*}\textbackslash{}n & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\textbackslash{}framebox\{ &  & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\textbackslash{}\& & \& & \tabularnewline
\hline 
/\# & \# & \tabularnewline
\hline 
/\$ & \$ & \tabularnewline
\hline 
/\% & \% & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\textbackslash{}textasciicircum\{\} & \textasciicircum{} & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\{{*}\} & {*} & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\textbackslash{}\_ & \_ & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\{{[}\} & {[} & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\{{]}\} & {]} & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\textbackslash{}\{ & \{ & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\textbackslash{}\} & \} & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\textbackslash{}textbackslash\{\} & \textbackslash{}\textbackslash{} & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\textbackslash{}textasciitilde\{\} & \textasciitilde{} & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\textbackslash{}{[} & \$\$ & \LaTeX{}'s centered equation syntax\tabularnewline
\hline 
\textbackslash{}{]} & \$\$ & \LaTeX{}'s centered equation syntax\tabularnewline
\hline 
{*}\textbackslash{}n & {*}\textbackslash{}n & where {*} is actually {[}space{]}{*}\tabularnewline
\hline 
 &  & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\end{tabular}


\subsection*{Conversion Set D: Environment Specific Find and Replace}

\textbf{General: }\textbackslash{}begin\{\LaTeX{}\_environment\} \emph{text
}\LaTeX{}\_tag \emph{text }\textbackslash{}end\{\LaTeX{}\_environment\}
$\rightarrow$ \textbackslash{}begin\{\LaTeX{}\_environment\} \emph{text
}Markdown\_tag \emph{text }\textbackslash{}end\{\LaTeX{}\_environment\}

\begin{tabular}{|c|c|c|c|}
\hline 
\LaTeX{}\_environment & \LaTeX{}\_tag & Markdown\_tag & Comments\tabularnewline
\hline 
\hline 
tabular & 1st: \textbackslash{}hline &  & only the first hline\tabularnewline
\hline 
tabular & 2nd: \textbackslash{}hline & ----|---- & \# of |'s depend on \# of columns, i.e. \# of c's in \{c|c|c|c\} expression\tabularnewline
\hline 
tabular & rest: \textbackslash{}hline \textbackslash{}n &  & i.e. remove the \LaTeX{}\_tag\tabularnewline
\hline 
tabular & \&$ $ & | & i.e. remove the \LaTeX{}\_tag\tabularnewline
\hline 
\textbackslash{}tabularnewline &  &  & Whenever $\exists$ \textbackslash{}hline, there $\exists$ \textbackslash{}tabularnewline\tabularnewline
\hline 
\end{tabular}
\end{document}
